title: Bombardier Inc.
summary: Bombardier Inc. (French pronunciation: ​[bɔ̃baʁdje]) is a Canadian business jets manufacturer. It was also formerly a manufacturer of commercial jets, public transport vehicles, trains, and recreational vehicles, with the last being spun-off as Bombardier Recreational Products. The company originally produced snowmobiles, over the years it expanded into the aviation, rail, and public transit businesses.
